title: Dashboard Real-time Data Accuracy
description: Verify the main dashboard displays accurate and real-time sales, inventory, and staff attendance data, with correct low stock and attendance alerts.

steps.description: Login as a business owner or manager.
Navigate to the main dashboard page.
Verify sales summary numbers match the backend sales data.
Verify inventory levels display current stock accurately and trigger low stock alerts if applicable.
Verify staff attendance data and alerts are correct and up-to-date.

title: POS System Order Processing Complete Flow
description: Validate POS system allows menu browsing, adding modifiers, managing cart, applying discounts, and processing orders for dine-in, takeaway, and delivery.

steps.description: Open POS page.
Browse menu categories and select items.
Add available modifiers with quantity and price adjustments.
Add items to cart and update quantities.
Apply a valid discount code.
Select order type: dine-in, takeaway, delivery.
Enter valid phone number for delivery/takeaway orders.
Complete payment and submit order.
Verify order appears in order queue with correct details and status.
Verify receipt printing option is available and prints correct details.

title: POS System Phone Number Validation
description: Ensure the phone number input in POS validates Brunei phone number format and rejects invalid entries.

steps.description: Navigate to POS order page.
Select delivery order type.
Enter invalid phone number formats (e.g., too short, letters included).
Verify validation error message is displayed and order submission is blocked.
Enter a valid Brunei phone number.
Verify error message disappears and order submission is allowed.

title: Menu Management CRUD Operations
description: Verify creation, updating, toggling availability, and deletion of menu items, categories, and modifiers behave correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to menu management page.
Create a new menu category.
Confirm the new category appears in the list.
Add a menu item with pricing and assign to the category.
Verify the new menu item displays correctly.
Add modifiers to the menu item ensuring modifier group rules are followed.
Verify modifiers appear and pricing updates correctly.
Toggle availability status of menu item and category.
Verify unavailable items/categories do not appear in POS menu.
Edit menu item pricing and save changes.
Verify new pricing is reflected in POS and orders.
Delete created menu item and category.
Confirm these items no longer appear anywhere.

title: Kitchen Display System Order Status and Timer
description: Validate kitchen staff can view orders, update preparation statuses, and timers track order preparation times accurately.

steps.description: Place an order through POS system.
Open Kitchen Display System page.
Verify the new order appears in the preparation queue.
Start timers for order items from the KDS.
Verify timers count upwards from start time.
Update order item status to cooking, ready, and completed.
Confirm statuses update visually and reflect in the order system.

title: Inventory Management Stock Adjustment and Alerts
description: Verify CRUD operations on stock items, recording adjustment reasons, and triggering low stock alerts.

steps.description: Navigate to inventory management page.
Create a new stock item with category and unit.
Verify new stock item is listed.
Perform stock adjustments with valid reason selection.
Confirm adjustment history logs contain correct reason and amounts.
Reduce stock below low stock threshold.
Ensure low stock alert notifications appear.
Delete test stock item.
Confirm item is removed from inventory list.

title: HR Module Staff Attendance with Photo Proof and PIN
description: Verify staff clock-in and clock-out functionality with photo proof upload and PIN validation.

steps.description: Login as a staff member.
Navigate to time clock system.
Clock in by entering valid PIN and upload photo proof.
Verify clock-in time is recorded accurately with photo proof saved.
Attempt to clock in with invalid PIN.
Verify access denied message appears.
Clock out similarly with valid PIN and photo.
Verify clock-out time is recorded.

title: HR Module Payroll with TAP/SCP Deductions
description: Validate payroll calculations including salary, deductions, TAP/SCP statutory contributions, and accurate payslip generation.

steps.description: Login as HR manager.
Navigate to payroll management page.
Process payroll for selected staff.
Verify salary calculation is accurate based on input data.
Confirm TAP and SCP deductions conform to Brunei statutory rules.
Generate payslip for staff member.
Verify payslip includes correct salary, deductions, and net pay.

title: Staff Portal Leave Application and Approval Workflow
description: Test staff can submit leave applications with balance verification and HR managers can approve or reject requests.

steps.description: Login as staff.
Navigate to leave application page.
Apply for leave with valid dates and leave type.
Verify leave balance is checked and leave application submission succeeds if balance permits.
Login as HR manager.
Navigate to leave approvals dashboard.
Approve or reject the submitted leave request.
Verify staff leave status updates accordingly and notifications sent.

title: Delivery Hub Multi-Platform Order Synchronization
description: Validate orders from Grab, FoodPanda, and Shopee sync correctly to delivery hub with status updates and audio notifications.

steps.description: Simulate incoming orders from Grab, FoodPanda, and Shopee.
Open Delivery Hub page.
Verify all new orders are listed with correct platform and details.
Verify audio notification plays on new order arrival.
Update delivery status of an order.
Confirm status update persists and reflects in sync service.
Print delivery slip.
Verify printed slip contains correct order and delivery details.

title: Finance Module Expense Tracking and Reporting
description: Ensure expenses can be added, daily cash flow tracked, and profit & loss reports generated accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to finance module.
Add new expense with category, amount, and date.
Verify expense appears in expense list.
View daily cash flow dashboard.
Confirm cash flow numbers update with new expenses.
Generate profit and loss report for a selected period.
Verify report data accuracy against input expenses and incomes.

title: Promotions Module Discount Application and Restrictions
description: Test multiple discount types apply correctly respecting usage limits, date/time/day restrictions, and applicable items.

steps.description: Create different promotions with discounts: percentage, fixed amount, buy-one-get-one.
Set usage limits and active date/time ranges.
Apply discounts during relevant POS orders.
Verify discounts apply correctly, usage limits are decremented, and discounts fail outside active periods.
Attempt to use expired or exceeded-limit discounts.
Verify system blocks the discount application.

title: Internationalization UI Language Switching
description: Validate all UI components correctly display text in English and Bahasa Melayu based on user language selection.

steps.description: Login to application.
Switch UI language to Bahasa Melayu.
Verify all labels, buttons, menus, and messages appear correctly translated.
Switch UI language back to English.
Verify all UI text reverts correctly to English.

title: Progressive Web App Offline Functionality and Service Worker
description: Ensure the app works offline with cached data, service worker registration, and prompts updates correctly.

steps.description: Access app online to allow service worker to cache content.
Disable network connection.
Navigate through various app pages.
Verify content loads from cache without errors.
Re-enable network connection.
Trigger app update check.
Verify update prompt displays and user can apply update.

title: System Security: PIN and Role-Based Access Enforcement
description: Validate that restricting module and action access by user role and PIN authentication works consistently.

steps.description: Login as user with basic staff role.
Attempt to access HR payroll and settings pages.
Verify access is denied.
Attempt to clock in/out with incorrect PIN.
Verify authentication fails with error message.
Login as admin user and verify full access.

title: Audit Log Records User Actions
description: Ensure system audit log tracks critical user actions like login, data changes, approvals, and settings updates.

steps.description: Perform actions such as login, staff profile update, leave approval, inventory adjustment.
Navigate to audit log page.
Verify each action is recorded with user, timestamp, and action details.

title: Staff Portal Photo Proof Upload in Checklists
description: Verify staff can upload photos when submitting daily opening and closing checklists and view upload history.

steps.description: Login as staff.
Navigate to checklist page.
Complete checklist items and upload photo proof.
Verify photos upload successfully and checklist submission succeeds.
Navigate to checklist history page.
Confirm checklist entries and photos are correctly displayed.

title: Shift Swap Requests and Approval
description: Test staff can request shift swaps and HR or managers can approve or reject requests with notifications.

steps.description: StaffA requests a shift swap with StaffB.
Verify request is created and notified to StaffB.
StaffB approves the swap request.
Verify schedule updates for both staff and notification sent.
Attempt invalid swaps (e.g., same shift).
Confirm system blocks invalid requests.
